```{python}
url = "https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=World_Happiness_Report&oldid=1241093905"

response = requests.get(url)
print(f"Status code: {response.status_code}")
print(f"Content length: {len(response.content)} bytes")
print(f"Content type: {response.headers.get('content-type', 'Unknown')}")
```

```{python}
# Explore the response object
print("Status code:", response.status_code)
print("Response headers (first 5):")
for i, (key, value) in enumerate(response.headers.items()):
    if i < 5:
        print(f"  {key}: {value}")
    else:
        break

# Look at the first 1000 characters of HTML
print("\nFirst 1000 characters of HTML:")
print(response.text[:1000])
```

```{python}
html_content = response.text
soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')
```
